description: So you want to run an A/B test! How long should you run it for? How will you know if an observed difference is real? Does it matter what my A/B test is measuring? All of these questions and more can be answered by learning about Hypothesis Testing in SciPy. You might have heard of T-Tests, Chi Squared, and ANOVA in your high school stats class, but you've never heard them explained like this!
title: How to Prove You’re Right: A/B Testing with SciPy
